title: Topic 001 Question 359
body: A security engineer is configuring a new website that is named example.com. The security engineer wants to secure communications with the website by requiring users to connect to example.com through HTTPS.
Which of the following is a valid option for storing SSL/TLS certificates?
options: Custom SSL certificate that is stored in AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS)
Default SSL certificate that is stored in Amazon CloudFront.
Custom SSL certificate that is stored in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM)
Default SSL certificate that is stored in Amazon S3
